summary: The Research for Environmental Uses and Sustainable Economies Act of 2025 (REUSE Act of 2025) mandates the EPA Administrator to prepare a report on the feasibility and best practices of reuse and refill systems for various sectors. The report, due within two years of the Act's enactment, will analyze system types, equitable distribution methods, job creation potential, economic costs and benefits, required support, and existing implementation barriers. The Administrator is directed to consider relevant information and consult with stakeholders.
